author: cnbc.com
title: MFGP SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Micro Focus International plc
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Micro Focus International plc (“Micro Focus” or the “Company”) (NYSE: MFGP) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://www.wongesq.com/pslra-c/micro-focus-international-plc . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On March 19, 2018, Micro Focus announced the resignation of its Chief Executive Officer and disclosed that the Company was lowering its constant currency revenue guidance for the twelve months ending October 31, 2018. On this news, Micro Focus shares fell from a close of $26.21 per share on March 16, 2018, to a close of $14.01 on March 19, 2018.
To learn more about the investigation of Micro Focus contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://www.wongesq.com/pslra-c/micro-focus-international-plc .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
